name: Ornate Kabuto
title: Bygone Lightning: Ornate Kabuto
desc: "Thirteen years went by like a dream. The scarlet snow flies through the shadowed pass like smoke. You have now gone afar."
inPlayDescription: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">After another character of yours uses an Elemental Burst: The character to which this is attached gains 1 <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Energy.

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">After another character of yours uses an Elemental Burst: The character to which this is attached gains 1 <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Energy.(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
